text:
出发时间:8:15【请务必准时，到时发车】
出发地点:国际学术交流中心门口（天勤路）/创新中心B区门口
*⃣️*⃣️*⃣️【注意】请选手及监护人带好午餐券
*⃣️用餐时间
早 餐：6:30-8:00 中教公寓一层/创B三层
午 餐：12:00-14:00 汇高花园酒店
晚 餐：17:30-18:00 简 餐
*⃣️体验活动
09:00-11:30
参访天津动物园——观看国宝大熊猫
15:30-16:30
参访津湾广场园区
trans:
Departure time: 8:15 [Please be on time, the bus will depart on time]
Departure location: Entrance of International Academic Exchange Center (Tianqin Road)/Entrance of Area B of Innovation Center
*⃣️*⃣️*⃣️[Note] Participants and guardians please bring lunch coupons
*⃣️ Meal time
Breakfast: 6:30-8:00 First floor of Zhongjiao Apartment/Third floor of Area B of Innovation Center
Lunch: 12:00-14:00 Huigao Garden Hotel
Dinner: 17:30-18:00 Simple meal
*⃣️Experiential activities
09:00-11:30
Visit Tianjin Zoo - Meet the national treasure-giant panda
15:30-16:30
Visit Jinwan Square Park
